All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AffineImagePointTransformer
Defines a coordinate transformation of 2D points (two dimensional vectors) where the coordinate transformation can be described by an affine transformation.
AffineTransformationStep
Defines an ImageTransformationStep transforming an image based on an affine transformation.
BasicImageTransformations
Defines a subset of commonly used 2D affine transformations.
BasicImageTransformations.Builder
This class is to be used to create BasicImageTransformations instances.
ImagePointTransformer
Defines an interface for transforming 2D points (two dimensional vectors) from one coordinate system to another.
ImageTransformationStep
Defines an element of a series of transformation applied to an image.
InterpolationType
Defines types of interpolation to be used when scaling an image.
SerialImagePointTransformer
Defines a coordinate transformation based on a list of other coordinate transformations.
TransformationStepInput
Defines the input of an ImageTransformationStep.
TransformationStepInput.Cmp
Defines a quick comparison of two TransformationStepInput instances.
TransformationSteps
Contains static utility methods related to ImageTransformationStep.
TransformedImage
Defines the output of an image transformation.
ZoomToFitOption
Defines the possible rules which should be applied when scaling an image to fit a particular display.
ZoomToFitTransformationStep
Defines an ImageTransformationStep scaling the input image to fit the display.
